issue.title: [Packaging] Correctly handle ssh origin urls for crossbow
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3572?focusedCommentId=16868976) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is a serious rough edge – I wasted a bunch of time on this today because the Crossbow documentation does not state that SSH origin URLs are not supported
